document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Published data. Iran ( Baudi 1878 , Persia, general distribution; Jacobson 1915 , Persia, checklist; Uhmann et al . 2005, general distribution; Сhandler et al . 2008, as
Stricticollis
, checklist); Guilan (
Bonadona 1970, as
Formicomus nobilis
); Albroz Mts. (
Uhmann 1988, as
Formicomus
); East Azarbaijan, Guilan, Lorestan, Mazandaran / Tehran ( Kejval 2006 ); East Azarbaijan (Atamehr et al . 2004).

,leg. Frenzel (1 NME ).
Chorotype. Сentralasiatic-European-Mediterranean (1.06 СEM) northwards to the Baltic Sea ( Latvia ). Phenology. April to September.
Published data. Iran (Uhmann et al . 2005, general distribution); Lorestan (Uhmann 1985).

Comments. All records for Iran based on misidentified specimens of
A. nadari (Pic)
and
A. nemrod
(LaF.) according to Kejval (2006) . This species does not occurs in Iran .
